discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
HR Fundamentals ebook page 232: Listening Posts enable you to quickly capture in-the-moment feedback from micro experiences from employees. Admins can create and trigger short Pulse Surveys across various stages of an employee journey.

questions.question_text: Which ServiceNow feature is used to create pulse surveys?

choices.A: Human Resources Scoped App: Employee Relations [com.sn_hr_employee_relations]
choices.B: Human Resources Scoped App: Data Migration [com.sn_hr_migration]
choices.C: Human Resources Scoped App: Lifecycle Events [com.sn_hr_lifecycle_events]

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
HR Implementation ebook page 200: The HR Data and Role migration plugin is recommended when upgrading from the global version of HR to the scoped version.

questions.question_text: Which plugin is recommended when upgrading from the global version of HR to the scoped version?
Which portal allows employees to submit ethical violation complaints?

discussion.content:
From Vancouver it is Anonymous Reporting (ARC).
This question is outdated.

questions.question_text: When creating a new Lifecycle Event activity set, what happens when the audience field is set as empty?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
HR Implementation ebook page 81: If the audience field is empty, the activity set applies to all employees.

choices.D: The activity set will not apply to any employees.
choices.C: The activity set will not apply to a specific group of people.
choices.A: The activity set applies to all employees.
choices.B: The activity set applies for a specific group of people.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
